response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product, which I believe will significantly contribute to your endeavors and goals, is priced at $950,000. I understand its worth to you stands at $800,000, but I believe this offer presents a fair balance considering the quality and potential benefits it offers. I look forward to discussing the details further and exploring how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 950000}
